Package edu.northeastern.csye.tms.dao

Class UserDAO

java.lang.Object
edu.northeastern.csye.tms.dao.UserDAO
All Implemented Interfaces:
GenericDAO<User>
@Repository public class UserDAO extends Object implements GenericDAO<User>
A data access object class that provides CRUD operations for User entities.
